description: A tax ID identifies a business in a certain tax juristiction.

jurisdiction.description: Tax jurisdiction where the tax ID is registered.

id.description: The ID of the tax jurisdiction.

name.description: The name of the tax jurisdiction.

region.description: Tax jurisdiction's region, if any. 2-letter ISO 3166-1 code

state.description: The verification status of the tax ID in the related tax agency.

valid_from.description: The tax ID's validity date. Defaults to the beginning of the year.

valid_until.description: The tax ID's expiration date, or null if the tax ID has no expiration date.

value.description: Value of the tax ID. For instance, a VAT number.

created_at.description: Time at which the object was created. Measured in seconds since the Unix epoch.
